title: The Comparison Page
subtitle: Comparing cryptocurrency market prices across exchanges
body:
When using InterTrader, if you're not [searching for profitable trades](/user-guide/finding-profitable-cryptocurrency-pairs/ "Finding profitable cryptocurrency pairs: search and analysis") , a lot of your time will be spent on the comparison page where you can see the prices of the cryptocurrency pair across multiple exchanges, see the potential profit (if any) and view the orderbooks of the various exchanges.

##
